New Records: Anthony Edwards scored a career-high 53 points
Anthony Edwards sank a personal-best 10 triples
Key Match Events: The Pistons led by as much as 24 points in the contest
Edwards went scoreless over nine minutes in the fourth quarter until making a layup with 22.1 seconds left
Post-Match Reflections: The Timberwolves have now lost its last three games and six of its previous 10 to drop its record to 17-17 on the season
Miscellaneous Highlights: Cade Cunningham led Detroit with 40 points
Malik Beasley added 23 points off the Pistons' bench
